data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word دَانِيَةٌ comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: to gather (grapes), pluck (fruits), snatch, cluster of fruit.
data.sentence: The word قُطُوفُهَا comes from the root ق ط ف and is associated with the meanings: to gather (grapes), pluck (fruits), snatch, cluster of fruit.
